msbt.message: You know it's Turkey Day, right? And that a celebrity chef will be cooking for us in the plaza?I can't wait!<10_4 /> Now, I want to dress nicely, but I don't want to stain any of my best clothesOoh! I'll wear my best tuxedounder my eleventh-best tuxedo.

Are you ready for the big Turkey Day event later? I hear Franklin's working on an exclusive tasting menu.I've been eating uncooked pasta with no sauce all week so that THIS food will taste even better. Ha HA!
Mmm I'm already thinking about the plaza being filled with gourmet amuse-bouches.That's French for mega nom-noms. I'm feeling so inspired that I might do some cooking of my own. Stop by!
